title: Captain Video: Master of the Stratosphere

sources.title: CAPTAIN VIDEOüçïMaster of the Stratosphere (1951) 15-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 15-chapter Cliffhanger!
tars: Judd Holdren, Larry Stewart, George Eldredge
Directors: Spencer Gordon Bennet, Wallace Grissell

Space hero Captain Video battles the evil Vultura, an extraterrestrial dictator who plans to conquer Earth by orchestrating climate change on a planetary scale!

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00      PizzaFLIX Intro
01:06     CHAPTER 1:  Journey into Space
29:28     CHAPTER 2:  Menace of Atoma
45:55     CHAPTER 3:  Captain Video's Peril
1:02:36  CHAPTER 4:  Entombed in Ice
1:19:20  CHAPTER 5:  Flames of Atoma
1:35:56  CHAPTER 6:  Astray in the Stratosphere
1:52:41  CHAPTER 7:  Blasted by the Atomic Eye
2:08:20  CHAPTER 8:  Invisible Menace
2:25:16  CHAPTER 9:  Video Springs a Trap
2:41:36  CHAPTER 10: Menace of the Mystery Metal
2:58:16  CHAPTER 11: Weapon of Destruction
3:15:19  CHAPTER 12: Robot Rocket
3:31:39  CHAPTER 13: Mystery of Station X
3:48:23  CHAPTER 14: Vengeance of Vultura
4:05:04  CHAPTER 15: Video vs. Vultura
4:22:34 Please Subscribe!

sources.title: Captain Video 1951 colorized cliffhanger serial
sources.description: Captain Video (Judd Holdren), the leader of a group of crime fighters known as the Video Rangers, battles an evil interplanetary menace, the dictator Vultura of the planet Atoma, who plans to conquer the Earth with help from the traitorous Earth scientist Dr. Tobor (George Eldredge). With Larry Stewart as Video Ranger 15-chapter serial, plus trailer

metadata.Plot: Space hero Captain Video, the leader of a group of crime-fighters known as the Video Rangers. Who battles the evil interplanetary menace, dictator Vultura on the planet Atoma, and his lackey, the traitorous earth scientist Dr. Tobor who are planning to conquer the earth.
metadata.Writer: Royal K. Cole, Sherman L. Lowe, Joseph F. Poland
metadata.Actors: Judd Holdren, Larry Stewart, George Eldredge
